title: TOWIE's Chloe Sims confesses secret fling with co-star Liam Gatsby, as he rows with Megan McKenna and Pete Wicks
text:
Get celebs   Thank you for subscribing!   
TOWIE ’s Chloe Sims has sensationally revealed she enjoyed a secret fling with co-star Liam ‘Gatsby’ Blackwell after he pursued her last year. 
The mother of one succumbed to Gatsby’s charms off camera and they indulged in a secret hook up before quietly splitting ahead of the new series. 
Chloe drops the huge bombshell when The Only Way Is Essex returns this Sunday for its 20th series. 
With the cast out in Tenerife for the annual episode abroad, Chloe finally decides it’s the right time to ‘fess up and reveals she had a whirlwind romance with Gatsby only to then split. Chloe reveals her bombshell on Sunday (Photo: ITV) Liam pictured on Sunday (Photo: ITV) Chloe looks glam in the TOWIE publicity picture (Photo: ITV Picture Desk) Read More Chloe Sims says TOWIE co-stars left with bruising after 'unprovoked attack fuelled by jealousy' in Tenerife 
But as far as Gatsby is concerned, it’s not the end and he makes it clear he’ll do anything to win Chloe back. 
The last time fans caught up the TOWIE gang on screen, Liam had admitted to fancying Chloe but she didn’t seem that keen to take things past friendship. 
After trying to get it on with Ferne McCann and memorably whisking her off on a helicopter for their first date, he turned his attentions to Chloe, treating her to a day on a yacht. Liam and Gatsby in Tenerife (Photo: ITV) Liam suited and booted as always (Photo: ITV Picture Desk) Read More TOWIE stars Megan McKenna, Kate Wright, Danielle Armstrong and more flash the flesh in bikinis at birthday bash 
Nothing seemed to come of it, however, although there were a few rumours before Christmas they’d become close again while working on a charity song. 
It's not the first time Chloe's confessed to a secret fling with a co-star: she shocked fans in 2014 by revealing a brief off camera romance with Mario Falcone. 
Elsewhere in TOWIE’s series opener, there’s more drama involving Gatbsy when he starts a rumour about Megan McKenna ’s best friend Amber Turner, a new cast member, and Dan Edgar. 
Megan is NOT happy and unsurprisingly confronts Liam about his behaviour, leading to a huge argument. Her boyfriend Pete Wicks also gets involved as he tries to defend Megan and ends up facing off against Gatsby himself. Megan and Pete are loved up again this series (Photo: ITV) Lockie and girlfriend Yasmin (Photo: ITV Picture Desk) 
It’s all pretty awkward for Amber T who actually HAS a boyfriend and has to explain to him just what is going on. 
Meanwhile, following Danielle Armstrong’s departure from TOWIE at Christmas, her ex James ‘Lockie’ Lock is back with a new girlfriend, Yazmin, who makes her show debut. 
And we’ll FINALLY get the reason for Gemma Collins ’ mysterious hospitalisation while in Tenerife; she shared photos of herself in January with a drip in her hand but no explanation why. 
*TOWIE returns Sunday at 10pm on ITVBe.
